description: Naturally gluten-free polenta makes this pizza a perfect and delicious alternative.
name: Polenta Pizza Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 cups vegetable stock, made with 2 stock cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Bring the stock to the boil in a large pan and slowly whisk in the polenta in a steady stream. Cook for 4-5 minutes, stirring constantly, until it begins to thicken. Stir in the parmesan. Pour the mix onto a lined baking tray and spread out into a large circle with a spatula.
Pre-heat the oven to 200Â°C. Whisk the tomato puree, oregano, olive oil and a tablespoon of water together in a small bowl to make a sauce. Spread over the pizza base.
Tear the mozzarella and scatter over the top of the pizza. Drizzle with pesto and bake for 15 minutes until golden and crisp. Scatter with rocket and serve.
